body:
Let's see what we can do. Thanks for the report.

On 15 June 2015 at 14:55, Megabyteceer <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Oh, understand now : ) But really its not look like menu on device. Its
> show without scroll / rollup on device. Just blink. And i think it is
> another page with static menu is loaded.
> I think auto hide after choose will be enough (and hide if menu width is >
> 50% of description text width only). Thank you. I already finish with tour,
> but maybe sombody else will not confuse like me again. : )
